about_the_game:
Shooter's Island lets you train your FPS skills on mouse & keyboard, controller, or a VR setup.


This aim trainer comes complete with tracking training to test your perception, and flick training to test your reflexes and precision. Work with a pistol, assault rifle, or sniper to take down dummy targets all over the island. To emulate your favorite FPS games, switch between real-world physics and hit-scan bullet action.

Geography is everything


Shooter's Island features several distinct areas where you can train.

Check out the concrete jungle of a city, the evergreen forest, and the ominous volcano at the center of the island. For a simple trial, maybe start by seeing how well you do in The Pit, a small maze-like structure with dummy enemies around every corner.

Impressed with yourself?


After completing a trial, check your stats on the nearby panel to see how well you performed. Your accuracy and hit count are displayed here, so compete with yourself to see how much you can improve.

Shooter's Island can help you identify your strengths and weaknesses in FPS games, both in VR and other ports.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: i5 10600K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: i7 3770K or equivalent
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Shooter’s Island is an aim trainer with VR support, built for FPS pros and beginners alike. On an expansive, remote island, several trials await you that train your reflexes and precision. Analyze your shooting skills on your personal low-poly testing island!
